rules.natural: If an employee attends training, then department productivity increases.
Provided that an employee has internet access, a task is completed.

Under the condition that an employee works overtime, then if a project has manager approval, it follows that whenever it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, a project deadline is missed.
Either an employee works overtime or an employee works on the weekend.

Should a manager call a team meeting, then whenever a project has an urgent deadline, then if an employee works on the weekend, then given that a project has manager approval, it implies that if it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, a project deadline is missed.

Provided that a manager sends an email alert, then if a project has an urgent deadline, it follows that whenever an employee works on the weekend, then under the condition that a project has manager approval, then if it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, a project deadline is missed.
Whenever an employee has a performance review, a manager calls a team meeting.
Either an employee has a performance review or a manager evaluates a project.
Under the condition that a department produces a quarterly report, then if a manager evaluates a project, a manager sends an email alert.
Either a department produces a quarterly report or finance conducts a budget audit.
Whenever a computer is broken, an employee is not distracted from work.
Either a computer is broken or a printer is malfunctioning.
An employee works remotely or an employee is in a meeting.
If an employee is in a meeting, then an employee is not distracted from work.
Whenever it is not the case that an employee works remotely, then an employee has internet access, then an employee is fired.

If it is not the case that it is not the case that finance conducts a budget audit, then if a manager evaluates a project, a manager sends an email alert, then a warning is issued to an employee, then an employee's salary is reduced.

Under the condition that it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is promoted.
If it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is not promoted.

Should it not be the case that it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is granted a bonus, then an employee is under promotion review.

Whenever it is not the case that it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is granted a bonus, then an employee is not under promotion review.
If an employee does not attend training, then an employee is distracted from work.
